subject: Empanelment of Safety Consultant for all highway projects under NHAI- An Interim list of empanelled safety consultants in continuation to Circular No. 12.21/2020 dated 19.06.2020 and 12.24/2022 dated 13.01.2022
text: 'Rai4 <57y <THNf gffearu (T34 4aa7 & FTANf TAI4, IRG TYR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Rrn44 77 fl-5 & 6, #2r-10, ERAH, #ff faori} 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TM9/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Road Safetyl 2023 Policy Circular No.12.30/ 2023 dated 12th January, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/RSA/ Empanelment/2022/Part? (Comp. No. 176634)} CORRIGENDUM Sub:: Empanelment of Safety Consultant for all highway projects under NHAI--An Interim list of empanelled safety consultants in continuation to circular no. 12.21/2020 dated 19.06.2020 and12.24/2022 dated 13.01.2022- reg: An interim list of empanelled safety consultant on the subject matter was issued vide NHAI Policy Circular No. 12.29/2023 dated 5th January 2023_ 2. In the said Policy Circular , the name mentioned at Sr. No. of Team 2 (Sr. No. of firm 2) at Annexure-A, Avalozee Consultant Private Limited" may be read as Ayoleeza Consultant Private Limited M (Lt Col Chandan Vatsa, Retd.) Chief General Manager (Coord: ) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2.0 Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3_ Web Admin for circulation: A UU9 NHAL Copy
